Rulings.Base:
1. You cannot activate "Scrapstorm" while you have only 1 card in your Deck.
2. This card targets 1 face-up 'Scrap' monster you control. It cannot be activated during the Damage Step.
3. None of these effects are simultaneous. You send 1 'Scrap' monster to the GY, then, if you did, you draw a card.
4. Afterwards, you destroy the selected monster.
5. Even if the targeted monster is no longer face-up on the field when "Scrapstorm" resolves, you still send a 'Scrap' monster to the GY and draw a card.
6. If the target monster is face-down when this effect resolves, it is still destroyed.
